quote: I felt, as I have often felt, that my failing the truth could have no bearing at all on the Truth itself, which could never conceivably be in any sense dependent on me or on anyone.
quote_letters: I FELT AS I HAVE OFTEN FELT THAT MY FAILING THE TRUTH COULD HAVE NO BEARING AT ALL ON THE TRUTH ITSELF WHICH COULD NEVER CONCEIVABLY BE IN ANY SENSE DEPENDENT ON ME OR ON ANYONE
